questions.question: What is data integration in Power BI?

options.A: The process of combining data from different sources into a single, unified view.
options.B: The process of deleting data from sources.

questions.explanation: Data integration in Power BI involves combining data from different sources into a single, unified view, enabling comprehensive analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI data connectors?

options.A: To connect Power BI to various data sources.

questions.explanation: Power BI data connectors allow you to connect Power BI to various data sources, facilitating data integration and analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI dataflows?

options.A: To create and manage data transformation processes.

questions.explanation: Power BI dataflows create and manage data transformation processes, providing efficient and scalable data management.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI gateways?

options.A: To connect on-premises data sources to Power BI.

questions.explanation: Power BI gateways connect on-premises data sources to Power BI, enabling secure and reliable data access.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI APIs?

options.A: To programmatically interact with Power BI service.

questions.explanation: Power BI APIs allow you to programmatically interact with Power BI service, providing automation and integration capabilities.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI templates?
questions.explanation: Power BI templates allow you to create reusable report templates, providing consistency and efficiency in report creation.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI themes?

options.A: To apply consistent styling to reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI themes allow you to apply consistent styling to reports, providing a cohesive and professional appearance.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI bookmarks?

options.A: To save and share specific views of reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI bookmarks allow you to save and share specific views of reports, providing quick access to important insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI Q&A?

options.A: To interact with reports using natural language queries.

questions.explanation: Power BI Q&A allows you to interact with reports using natural language queries, providing intuitive and accessible data exploration.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI alerts?

options.A: To notify users of important changes in reports.

questions.explanation: Power BI alerts notify users of important changes in reports, providing timely and relevant information.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI subscriptions?

options.A: To automatically send reports to users on a regular basis.

questions.explanation: Power BI subscriptions automatically send reports to users on a regular basis, providing consistent and reliable access to insights.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI workspaces?

options.A: To organize and collaborate on content.

questions.explanation: Power BI workspaces organize and collaborate on content, providing a structured and collaborative environment for data analysis.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI dataflows?

options.A: To create and manage data transformation processes.

questions.explanation: Power BI dataflows create and manage data transformation processes, providing efficient and scalable data management.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI visuals?
questions.explanation: Power BI visuals allow you to create custom visualizations, providing flexibility and creativity in data presentation.

questions.question: What is the purpose of Power BI templates?
questions.explanation: Power BI templates allow you to create reusable report templates, providing consistency and efficiency in report creation.
